I am a PhD student at the [University of Minnesota](https://cla.umn.edu/statistics). In May 2015, I received my B.S. and B.A. from the [University of St. Thomas, St. Paul](https://www.stthomas.edu/). I majored in statistics, mathematics, and actuarial science and minored in renaissance. My research is currently supervised by [Adam J. Rothman](http://users.stat.umn.edu/~arothman/), Ph.D. and broadly relates to efficient precision matrix estimation.
